page.title: 15Hampton Bishop Area.
page.content:
Hampton Bishop is traditionally a farming village and a good deal of agriculture is still practised.
In recent years more homes have been built and many are now owned by people who are not connected with farming. There is quite a high proportion of old people living in the village and it may be that it is becoming known as as a retirement village.
The fields are mostly used to grow grass and we saw sheep , dairy cattle and bullocks grazing in them.
Some of the fields were being used for the production of hay or silage for winter feeding.
